each require a thousand cores well that's a lot of cores you don't want to try to launch all of
that in one placement group in one availability zone with one instance type
because you can actually run into you know capacity constraints because you're trying to put everything in a placement group the better strategy is a grid
strategy where you launch individual jobs let's say a thousand cores each in
different placement groups perhaps even in different availability zones right to
spread that load and that will give you much higher success in getting the capacity you need when you need it in
